column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zhao says : " You 're alive ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " You tried to have me killed ! "
#Text=Zhao says : " Yes I did .
#Text=" Zhao says : " You should have chosen to accept your failure ; you 're a disgrace .
#Text=Then , at least , you could have lived !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's too late , it 's dead .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You have been touched by the Moon Spirit .
#Text=Some of its life is in you .
#Text=" Yue says : " Yes , you 're right .
#Text=It gave me life , maybe I can give it back .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No !
#Text=You do n't have to do that .
#Text=" Yue says : " It 's my duty , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I wo n't let you !
#Text=Your father told me to protect you .
#Text=" Yue says : " I have to do this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No !
#Text=She 's gone , she 's gone .
#Text="
